steps.title: Prepare different cuts of vegetables.
steps.content: Prepare different cuts of vegetables. There are the maçedoine, julienne, jardinière and paysanne methods to choose from. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Cut the pork into the same size as the vegetables.
steps.content: Cut the pork into the same size as the vegetables. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Prepare your heated cooking oil in a pan.
steps.content: Prepare your heated cooking oil in a pan.

steps.title: Pour all the onion and garlic together first and forget about what they say about putting the carrots.
steps.content: Pour all the onion and garlic together first and forget about what they say about putting the carrots. It doesn't taste good when carrots are over - boiled. Once the onion is cooked but not browned, add the meat and carrots. Once everything is fully cooked, add the water. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Adding the tomato sauce, seasoning and white pepper is optional.
steps.content: Adding the tomato sauce, seasoning and white pepper is optional. (You are often told to add broth cubes and other kinds of seasoning, but it's cheating). [4] X Research source

steps.title: Boil for a few minutes until cooked.
steps.content: Boil for a few minutes until cooked. [5] X Research source
